rules.name: Safe Mode Threshold
rules.message: Safe mode threshold outside safe range
rules.impact: Too low: premature safe mode exit. Too high: SCM stuck in safe mode

rules.name: Pipeline Creation Interval
rules.message: Pipeline creation interval outside recommended range
rules.impact: Too short: excessive pipeline churn. Too long: slow pipeline recovery

rules.name: SCM Handler Count
rules.message: SCM handler count outside recommended range
rules.recommendation: Set scm.handler.count.key between 20-100 based on cluster size
rules.impact: Too few handlers cause datanode heartbeat delays

rules.name: Container Report Interval
rules.message: Container report interval outside recommended range
rules.impact: Too short: excessive SCM load. Too long: slow container state updates

rules.name: Container Close Threshold
rules.recommendation: Use 5GB for most workloads, 1GB for small files
rules.impact: Affects replication overhead and storage efficiency
